text: mahina'one agala pachala kari devum inkarano atireka che, ana vade te loko pathabhrasta karavamam ave che, je'o inkara kare che, eka varsa to tene halala kari de che, ane bija varse tene ja pavitra therave che ke allaha'e je pavitrata rakhi che teni ganatarimam tame barabari kari lo, pachi tene halala banavi lo jene allaha'e harama karyo che, te'one te'ona kharaba krtyo sara batavi devamam avya che ane inkara karanara'oni komane allaha margadarsana nathi apato
